statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); dir="${cwd/#$HOME/~}"; git_info=""; if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo "detached"); if git -C "$cwd" -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false diff --quiet 2>/dev/null && git -C "$cwd" -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null; then git_info=$(printf ' \033[38;2;64;160;43m✓ %s\033[0m' "$branch"); else git_info=$(printf ' \033[38;2;210;15;57m✗ %s\033[0m' "$branch"); fi; fi; printf '\033[38;2;30;102;245m%s\033[0m%s \033[38;2;108;111;133m%s\033[0m' "$dir" "$git_info" "$model"
